name: Pok√©mon HOME
description: Pokmon HOME is a cloud-based service, designed as a place where all of your Pokmon can gather.    Manage your Pokmon! You can bring any Pokmon that has appeared in a Pokmon core series game to Pokmon HOME. Youll also be able to bring certain Pokmon from Pokmon HOME for your Nintendo Switch system to your Pokmon Sword or Pokmon Shield game.   Trade Pokmon with players around the world! If you have a smart device, youll be able to trade Pokmon with players around the world anytime you want, anywhere you are. Enjoy different ways of trading, too, like the Wonder Box and GTS!   Complete the National Pokdex! Youll be able to complete your National Pokdex by bringing lots of Pokmon to Pokmon HOME. Youll also be able to check out all the moves and Abilities your Pokmon have.   Receive Mystery Gifts! Youll be able to quickly and conveniently receive Mystery Gifts using your smart device!    Terms of Use Please read the Terms of Use before using this service.   Compatible Systems Pokmon HOME can be used on devices with the following OSes. Android 6 and above NOTE: Please be aware that Pokmon HOME may not work on certain devices.   Questions Should you have any questions, please use the contact form found in Pokmon HOME. Questions submitted without using the contact form may take longer to be addressed.
